CustomField.description: Formula to display correct value in appropriate language (taken from value in Requires PreApproval formula field).
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Requires_Pre_Approval_Formula__c , 'Yes', CASE( Contractor_Language__c , "Quebec French", "Oui", "Spanish", "SÃ­", "Yes") ,
'No', CASE(Contractor_Language__c , "Quebec French", "Non", "No") ,
'')
CustomField.label: Requires Pre-Approval
